short_bio: I'm a full-stack developer with 10+ years experience. I'm excited about design, UX and creative hobbies in general. I've been part of two startup accelerators so far.

job_history.role: I've mentored nearly 100 people and helped them to change their careers to become junior developers. In the last period of my job I've lead two in-house software projects where I worked with students to develop real products.
I've built various full-stack websites for clients and took part in smaller projects.
I founded a startup with the goal to build a browser based video editing platfrom. We reached private beta. I created all frontend code, UX.
I founded a music starup to collect and analyze music from the web with my own search bot, using the SoundCloud API.
I was the head of development and UX. I helped to translate client needs to production ready specifications.
My first venture to build websites and web applications for clients. As a founder I participated and oversaw development.
